#summary Set up Eclipse for developing the project
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

This will guide you through setting up Eclipse to edit files for the project.


= Eclipse =

Eclipse provides a great single interface for most of the aspects of this project. You will need to have a recent [http://java.sun.com JRE] (a JDK will also work) and a recent version of [http://www.eclipse.org Eclipse].
